text: Jürgen Blum (born 21 April 1956) is a German equestrian. He competed in the team eventing at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:German male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Germany Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Munich
title: Jürgen Blum
